title: Pricing – UseMe Labs
description: Transparent pricing in EUR with monthly terms, VAT invoicing and self-serve cancellation.

hero.headline: Plans that scale with your team
hero.subheadline: Every plan includes Lithuanian-tuned models, audit logs and support. Contracts stay flexible.

cards.title: Starter
cards.description: Perfect for small teams accelerating document automation and knowledge Q&A.

cards.title: Growth
cards.description: For scaling teams that need integrations, advanced workflows and detailed audit trails.
features: Connectors for CRM, BI and ticketing systems

cards.title: Enterprise
cards.description: For large organisations requiring SSO, hybrid deployment and a dedicated success team.

sections.heading: How billing works
sections.body: Prices exclude VAT. We issue Lithuanian VAT invoices with customer-specific IDs. Billing is monthly and you can cancel any time.
bullets: Bank transfer or card payments supported

sections.heading: Need something bespoke?
sections.body: Share your requirements and we will prepare a tailored package with the right compliance, rollout and success services.
